mapper.select: SELECT EP_ID AS epId FROM sl_ep_brand WHERE EP_ID = #{filterMap.epId} AND BRAND_ID = #{filterMap.brandId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sl_ep_brand_honor ( EP_ID, BRAND_ID, HONOR_ID, HONOR_DES, HONOR_NO, CERT_DATE, CERT_ISSUER, CRT_ID, DEL_FLG, CRT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{epId}, #{brandId}, #{honorId}, #{honorDes}, #{honorNo}, #{certDate}, #{certIssuer}, #{crtId}, #{delFlg}, SYSDATE(), #{ver} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sl_ep_brand_honor SET EP_ID = #{epId}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId}, HONOR_ID = #{honorId}, HONOR_DES = #{honorDes}, HONOR_NO = #{honorNo}, CERT_DATE = #{certDate}, CERT_ISSUER = #{certIssuer}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME=SYSDATE(), VER = #{ver} WHERE EP_ID = #{epId} AND BRAND_ID = #{brandId} AND HONOR_ID = #{honorId}
